file_content_changes:
@@ -99,7 +99,7 @@ jobs:

           cd python/test/unit
-          python3 -m pytest
+          python3 -m pytest -n 8
 
       - name: Create artifacts archive

           cd python/test/unit/language

           sudo nvidia-smi -i 0 -rgc
